trans-unit.source: Supports iterating over a <xref:System.String> object and reading its individual characters.
trans-unit.target: 支持遍历<xref:System.String>对象和读取其各个字符。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: A CharEnumerator provides read-only access to the characters in a referenced <xref:System.String> object.
trans-unit.target: CharEnumerator 提供对中的引用的字符的只读访问权限<xref:System.String>对象。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: For example, the `foreach` statement of the Microsoft Visual Basic and C# programming languages, which iterates through the elements of a collection, retrieves a CharEnumerator from a <xref:System.String> object in order to iterate through the characters in that object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`foreach`语句的 Microsoft Visual Basic 和 C# 的编程语言，它循环访问集合的元素，检索从 CharEnumerator<xref:System.String>以循环访问该对象中的字符的对象。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: There is no public constructor for CharEnumerator.
trans-unit.target: CharEnumerator 没有公共构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call a <xref:System.String> object's <xref:System.String.GetEnumerator%2A> method to obtain a CharEnumerator that is initialized to reference the string.
trans-unit.target: 而应调用<xref:System.String>对象的<xref:System.String.GetEnumerator%2A>方法来获取初始化后将引用字符串 CharEnumerator。</xref:System.String.GetEnumerator%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A CharEnumerator maintains an internal index to the characters in the string the CharEnumerator references.
trans-unit.target: CharEnumerator 保持到字符串中字符的内部索引 CharEnumerator 引用。

trans-unit.source: The state of the index is invalid when it references a character position logically before the first character or after the last character in the string, and valid when it references a character within the string.
trans-unit.target: 引用字符串内的字符时，索引的状态是无效的; 当它引用字符串中的字符位置逻辑上第一个字符之前或之后的最后一个字符和有效。

trans-unit.source: The index is initialized to a position logically before the first character, and is set to a position after the last character when the iteration is complete.
trans-unit.target: 索引函数将初始化为逻辑上之前的第一个字符的位置，并设置到的位置后的最后一个字符迭代完成后。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if you attempt to access a character while the index is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试访问该字符，该索引无效时，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CharEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method increments the index by one, so the first and subsequent characters are accessed in turn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CharEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>方法索引递增&1;，因此反过来访问的第一个和后续字符。</xref:System.CharEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CharEnumerator.Reset%2A> method sets the index to a position logically before the first character.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CharEnumerator.Reset%2A>方法设置为逻辑上之前的第一个字符的位置的索引。</xref:System.CharEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CharEnumerator.Current%2A> property retrieves the character currently referenced by index.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CharEnumerator.Current%2A>属性检索当前引用的索引的字符。</xref:System.CharEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CharEnumerator.Clone%2A> method creates a copy of the CharEnumerator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CharEnumerator.Clone%2A>方法会创建一份 CharEnumerator。</xref:System.CharEnumerator.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Several independent instances of CharEnumerator across one or more threads can have access to a single instance of <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> CharEnumerator 跨一个或多个线程的多个独立实例可以有权访问<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>的单个实例

trans-unit.source: This class is implemented to support the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现此类是为了支持<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>接口。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: For more information regarding the use of an enumerator, see the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用枚举器的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>主题。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the current <xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建一份当前<xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The return value is a copy of this instance of <xref:System.CharEnumerator> and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是此实例的副本<xref:System.CharEnumerator>及其当前状态。</xref:System.CharEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for saving your state while iterating through a <xref:System.String> object.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于循环访问时保存状态<xref:System.String>对象。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose your application uses an original instance of <xref:System.CharEnumerator> to iterate through each character in a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你的应用程序使用<xref:System.CharEnumerator>来循环访问一种<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>中每个字符</xref:System.CharEnumerator>的原始实例

trans-unit.source: When some unique character is encountered, your application pauses processing and invokes the Clone method.
trans-unit.target: 当遇到某些唯一字符时，你的应用程序将暂停处理，并调用克隆方法。

trans-unit.source: In effect, this saves the <xref:System.CharEnumerator> object's index in the <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 实际上，这将保存<xref:System.CharEnumerator><xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>中的对象的索引</xref:System.CharEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Your application uses the clone to navigate to another part of the `String` to perform some auxiliary processing.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序使用克隆导航到的另一部分`String`执行一些辅助处理。

trans-unit.source: The side-effect of this navigation is the clone loses track of the position where processing stopped.
trans-unit.target: 此导航的副作用是位置的克隆会失去对跟踪的处理停止时所在。

trans-unit.source: However, when the auxiliary processing is complete, your application discards the clone and uses the original <xref:System.CharEnumerator> instance to resume working on the <xref:System.String> where the original processing stopped.
trans-unit.target: 但是，辅助处理完成后，则你的应用程序将放弃克隆并使用原始<xref:System.CharEnumerator>实例继续处理<xref:System.String>原始处理停止的位置。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.CharEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is implemented to support the <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 实现此方法是为了支持<xref:System.ICloneable>接口。</xref:System.ICloneable>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is a copy of the current <xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，它是一份当前<xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently referenced character in the string enumerated by this <xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举的字符串中获取当前引用的字符<xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CharEnumerator> class maintains an internal index to the enumerated string, and the Current property returns the character that is currently referenced by the index.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CharEnumerator>类维护的枚举字符串的内部索引和当前的属性返回由索引当前引用的字符。</xref:System.CharEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: This property should be invoked only when the index is valid; otherwise, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 仅当此索引有效; 时，才应调用此属性否则，会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The index is always invalid for an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 该索引无效始终为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The index is also invalid after the <xref:System.String.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.CharEnumerator.Reset%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 该索引无效也后<xref:System.String.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.CharEnumerator.Reset%2A>调用方法。</xref:System.CharEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.String.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After either of these methods is called, invoke the <xref:System.CharEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method to adjust the index to the first character in the enumerated string.
trans-unit.target: 任一方法调用后，调用<xref:System.CharEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>方法调整到枚举字符串中的第一个字符的索引。</xref:System.CharEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index is valid whenever the <xref:System.CharEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此索引是否有效每当<xref:System.CharEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>方法返回`true`。</xref:System.CharEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Current does not move the index, and consecutive calls to Current return the same character until <xref:System.CharEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>, <xref:System.CharEnumerator.Reset%2A>, or <xref:System.String.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called.
trans-unit.target: 当前不会移动索引，并对当前连续调用返回之前的相同字符<xref:System.CharEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>， <xref:System.CharEnumerator.Reset%2A>，或<xref:System.String.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>称为。</xref:System.String.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.CharEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.CharEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Unicode character currently referenced by this <xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前引用此的 Unicode 字符<xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The index is invalid; that is, it is before the first or after the last character of the enumerated string.
trans-unit.target: 该索引无效;也就是说，它是第一个之前或之后枚举字符串的最后一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放当前实例所使用的所有资源<xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.CharEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用<xref:System.CharEnumerator>.</xref:System.CharEnumerator>时调用的 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.CharEnumerator> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法离开<xref:System.CharEnumerator>中不可用状态。</xref:System.CharEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.CharEnumerator> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.CharEnumerator> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 调用 Dispose 后，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.CharEnumerator>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.CharEnumerator>占用。</xref:System.CharEnumerator> </xref:System.CharEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.CharEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 始终调用释放在发布到<xref:System.CharEnumerator>。</xref:System.CharEnumerator>最后一个引用之前

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.CharEnumerator> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它所使用的资源之前，不会释放垃圾回收器调用<xref:System.CharEnumerator>对象的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.CharEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Increments the internal index of the current <xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref> object to the next character of the enumerated string.
trans-unit.target: 递增当前的内部索引<xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref>枚举字符串的下一个字符的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CharEnumerator> class maintains an internal index to the enumerated string, and the MoveNext method increments the index by one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CharEnumerator>类维护的枚举字符串的内部索引和 MoveNext 方法索引递增&1;。</xref:System.CharEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Call MoveNext after calling <xref:System.String.GetEnumerator%2A> or <xref:System.CharEnumerator.Reset%2A> to increment the current character position to the first character in the enumerated string.
trans-unit.target: 在调用后调用 MoveNext<xref:System.String.GetEnumerator%2A>或<xref:System.CharEnumerator.Reset%2A>递增到第一个字符中的枚举字符串的当前字符位置。</xref:System.CharEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.String.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check that the return value is `true` to determine that the current character position is valid.
trans-unit.target: 检查返回的值是否`true`以确定当前字符位置是否有效。

trans-unit.source: If the index is already beyond the last character of the enumerated string, the index is not changed and `false` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果索引已超出枚举字符串的最后一个字符，不会更改索引和`false`返回。

trans-unit.source: Notice that if the enumerated string is empty (""), the state of the <xref:System.CharEnumerator> is always invalid.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果枚举的字符串为空 ("")，则状态的<xref:System.CharEnumerator>始终无效。</xref:System.CharEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: This is because the internal index for the <xref:System.CharEnumerator> is initially before the first character of the enumerated string and is therefore invalid.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为的内部索引<xref:System.CharEnumerator>最初之前枚举字符串的第一个字符，因此无效。</xref:System.CharEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: MoveNext logically sets the index after the last (nonexistent) character of the enumerated string which is also invalid.
trans-unit.target: MoveNext 逻辑上也是无效的枚举字符串的最后一个 （不存在） 字符之后设置的索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the index is successfully incremented and within the enumerated string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成功递增索引和枚举的字符串; 内否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the index to a position logically before the first character of the enumerated string.
trans-unit.target: 初始化为以逻辑方式之前枚举字符串的第一个字符的位置的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CharEnumerator> class maintains an internal index to the enumerated string, and the Reset method sets the index to the invalid state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CharEnumerator>类维护的枚举字符串的内部索引和重置方法设置为无效状态的索引。</xref:System.CharEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently referenced character in the string enumerated by this <xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举的字符串中获取当前引用的字符<xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.CharEnumerator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.CharEnumerator>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>接口。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.CharEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: The boxed Unicode character currently referenced by this <xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前引用此的装箱的 Unicode 字符<xref href="System.CharEnumerator"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Enumeration has not started.
trans-unit.target: 枚举尚未开始。

trans-unit.source: -or- Enumeration has ended.
trans-unit.target: -或者-枚举已经终止。
